接口的使用
org.springframework.web.reactive.function.server.HandlerFunction

  • 使用HandlerFunction的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.web.reactive.function.server
    Provides the types that make up Spring's functional web framework.

    • org.springframework.web.reactive.function.server中HandlerFunction的使用

      default HandlerFunction<R> HandlerFilterFunction.apply(HandlerFunction<T> handler)
      Apply this filter to the given handler function, resulting in a filtered handler function.

      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<HandlerFunction<T>> RouterFunction.route(ServerRequest request)
      Return the handler function that matches the given request.
      参数类型为HandlerFunction的org.springframework.web.reactive.function.server中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default RouterFunction<T> RouterFunction.andRoute(RequestPredicate predicate, HandlerFunction<T> handlerFunction)
      Return a composed routing function that routes to the given handler function if this route does not match and the given request predicate applies.
      default HandlerFunction<R> HandlerFilterFunction.apply(HandlerFunction<T> handler)
      Apply this filter to the given handler function, resulting in a filtered handler function.
      RouterFunctions.Builder RouterFunctions.Builder.DELETE(java.lang.String pattern, HandlerFunction<ServerResponse> handlerFunction)
      Adds a route to the given handler function that handles all HTTP DELETE requests that match the given pattern.
      RouterFunctions.Builder RouterFunctions.Builder.DELETE(java.lang.String pattern, RequestPredicate predicate, HandlerFunction<ServerResponse> handlerFunction)
      Adds a route to the given handler function that handles all HTTP DELETE requests that match the given pattern and predicate.

      Apply this filter to the given handler function.
      RouterFunctions.Builder RouterFunctions.Builder.GET(java.lang.String pattern, HandlerFunction<ServerResponse> handlerFunction)
      Adds a route to the given handler function that handles all HTTP GET requests that match the given pattern.

      Receive notification of a standard predicated route to a handler function.
